description: Direct exposure to the performance of some of the largest and most liquid North American-listed gold producers. Looks to generate income through covered call writing, which historically produces higher yields in periods of volatility. Designed to provide a consistent monthly income with an opportunity for growth. GLCC seeks to provide, to the extent possible and net of expenses: (a) exposure to the performance of an index of equity securities of diversified North American listed gold producers (currently, the Solactive North American Listed Gold Producers Index) and (b) monthly distributions of dividend and call option income. To mitigate downside risk and generate income, GLCC will employ a dynamic covered call option writing program.
name: Global X Gold Producer Equity Covered Call ETF
